participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Caring and community-oriented, Mark loves to share his knowledge with the younger generation and enjoys helping others.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i was poor growing up.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and a bit quirky, Emily finds joy in baking and crafting, often expressing herself through her hobbies.
participant_2.background: i love to bake cookies. i have a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion.
